description: This file defines a class `AppTheme` that provides a customizable light theme for a Flutter app, including color palette, text styles, app bar, card, input decorations, buttons, divider, and chip themes.

classes.name: AppTheme
classes.description: A utility class providing predefined theme data for Flutter applications, specifically a light theme with custom color palette and styling.

methods.name: light
methods.description: Returns a `ThemeData` object configured for a light theme, including color scheme, text themes, app bar, card, input fields, buttons, divider, and chips.
